full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'KHOR LO 'BAR BA'I SGRUB THABS 'DON CHA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B ('KHOR LO 'BAR MA'I SGRUB THABS KYI 'DON CHA LUG BRA SPRAG NAS SGRIGS PA 'DI NI, DON GYI SLAD DU MTSAN NAS SMOS TE MKHAN CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO DANG DBYER MA MCHIS PA BKA' DRIN MNYAM MED RJE BTZUN 'GRO MGON BSTAN PA'I NYI MA DPAL BZANG POS 'DI LTA BU SGRIGS SHIG BKA' STZAL BA DANG DU BLANGS TE, DAM PA DE NYID KYIS BKA' 'BANGS THA MAL BIKshU WA KKINDRAS BSGRIGS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL 'DIS KYANG DAM PA DE NYID KYIS ZHABS PAD RDO RJE LTAR BRTAN CING RNAM 'BRING BA RNAMS KYIS CHOS SPYOD BCU'I MTHUN MONG @009A *, ,THAMS CAD YID BZHIN DU 'GRUB PAR GYUR CIG ,)
